1.content:
Welcome to the Interactive. First you need to pick a character. These first mammals are usually the most popular ones and fan faves.

Nick Wilde - The cunning and sly fox conman turned officer.

Judy Hopps - The spunky and optimistic little bunny cop.

Finnick - The little short-tempered fennec fox that's Nick's wingman.

Benjamin Clawhauser - The already chubby cheetah cop that really loves doughnuts.
1.title: Character choices

11.content:
So it's gonna be the city fox, Nick. Pick a section and start a story.

Story 1: For some reason, Nick has gained a 'wilde' appetite. His increased eating habit is now starting to take a toll on his body.

Story 2: Nick goes on a trip with Judy to Bunnyburrow and tries the local food scene. He then realizes that the food there might be more than he expected.

Story 3: Nick puts on a few, but Judy seems to like him that way. So she attempts to feed him more and more food.

Story 4: Instead of turning savage from the Night Howlers, it has 'another' effect to Nick.
11.title: Nick Wilde

choices: Might one to ease up on the doughnuts.
111.content:
Inspired and based on Jelliroll's Comic. May you rest in peace.

On desk duty was Zootopia's first fox cop, Nick Wilde. The former con artist turned cop enjoyed being part of the ZPD, but found desk duty could be boring. Nick was taking the place for Clawhauser. Currently, he was on the phone speaking with his bunny partner on the phone.

"It's no big deal, Carrots. I'm glad to help out." Nick said to Judy as she laid back on his chair with his feet on the desk.

"Do they have you on any big cases without me?" Judy asked.

"Naw. They got me on desk duty while Clawhauser is on vacation." Nick stated.

"Well, try to be good at your job. Even if it's only desk duty. Can you handle things without me?" Judy asked.

"Piece of cake!" Nick said still looking confidently. "See ya, Carrots!"

"Bye, Nick. I'll see you in a week." Judy said.

As Judy ended the call, Nick hears and sees a commotion.

"Huh?" Nick went.

"HEY!!! STOP RIGHT THERE!!!"

Nick get out of his desk to see what was wrong and sees that and large rhino got off of the hold one of Nick's fellow
officers and started running toward Nick.

"Wilde! Look out!" A grey slightly pudgy wolf officer shouted out.

"Get squished, copper!" The rhino shouted out as he charged at Nick.

Nick didn't seem fazed. Instead, he slight moved to his right with his left foot out and tripped the rhino over. Nick then pounced on the back of the rhino and cuffed him.

"Wow, great job!" The grey wolf said cheering on Nick.

"Whew, that was close!" A yellowish-brown mule said.

"You know what they say. The bigger they are, etc." Nick said as he gripped onto the rhino's arms.

Nick's ZPD training really paid for a small fox like him to apprehend a big rhino with such ease. The mule then took the rhino perp away. Nick then went back to the front desk.

"Thanks for the save, Wilde." The grey fox said thanking Nick. He then took out a brown paper bag. "Have these truffles. You earned them."

"Hey, thanks!" Nick said happily to accept the treats.

Nick quickly dug into the bag of tasty chocolate truffles. They were tiny but tasty. The bag turned emptied within a few seconds.

"Mmm! Wow, those went quick." Nick said as he licked his chops and sees there aren't any crumbs left.

Later, Nick is still on desk duty. Since nothing was happening, he decided to take a nap. Someone then walks up to Nick. It was the same mule from before, holding a box of doughnuts.

"Hey Wilde, thanks again for helping out earlier." The mule said thankfully. "These have a blueberry creme filling, I heard it was your favorite."

"It is, thanks!" Nick said eagerly taking the box.

Nick opened the box and sees half a dozen creme-filled doughnuts topped with chocolate creme. They each looked equally delicious. Nick then took one at popped it in his mouth. He was really good. Like tasting a piece of heaven and since they were blueberry flavored, it was even better. Enjoy the first one, Nick was tempted to get another.
111.title: Wilde Appetite

1111.content:
Nick decided to eat the rest of the doughnuts he was offered. However, eating all those doughy pastries had a drawback. As Nick was in the locker room, ready to end his shift and leave for the day, he looked down and noticed his gut had some extra pudge to it. Enough to make his cream-colored belly a bit exposed. Nick didn't seem to happy about it.

"Man, I can't believe I ate that whole box," Nick said to himself as he places his paws on his waist. "I'm gonna wind up like Clawhauser if I'm not careful."

Nick felt he needed to be careful not to overeat. Then someone called out to Nick. It was a male elephant in sweat clothes.

"Hey, Fox!" The elephant shouted out to get Nick's attention.

Nick turned around and looked a bit scared looking up at the large mammal. The elephant was carrying a large brown bag with his trunk.

"I heard ya help out my buddy Bianchi with a violent perp. I got ya some blueberry tarts as thanks." The elephant said.

"Umm.... wow.... thank you," Nick said losing some of his nervousness. The elephant then gave Nick the tarts. The bag was pretty big being about half of Nick's height. "I do love blueberry."

With the big bag of tarts, Nick made his way home. As he walked, he can smell the aroma of the blueberry pastries. It smelled so good he was tempted to eat one right now. But he decided to wait until he got home. After a few minutes, he finally made it to his apartment. Once there, he took one of the tarts from the bag. It looked like tarts were made for mammals on the larger side because they were much bigger than the tarts Nick usually gets.

"Yeesh. A lot are in here.... and they're huge." Nick said to himself. "I just have one."

After Nick ate and enjoy the first tart, he....
1111.title: Can't eat just one.

choices: Nick puts on more and more weight.
Nick felt that he should lose some weight.
11111.content:
A few minutes later, Nick gobbled up all of the tarts and had a stuffed stomach. As he laid down on the floor with his extended belly, he groaned in fullness.

"Ohhhhhh.... I made a huge mistake." Nick said to himself as he rubbed his stomach. "I'm so full. But they were so good."

Nick was starting to go from pudgy to chubby. Not just his gut, but is face cheeks as well.

"Might need to go on a diet soon." Nick said as he got back up.

The next day, Nick was back at work once again on desk duty fir Clawhauser. Even when he didn't ask for it, officers still offer Nick pastries. Nick felt that it was like they were trying to get him fat. But Nick didn't seem to mind. The treats were all too tasty.

As time goes by....
11111.title: Wilde getting Wider.

111111.content:
Nick was given more and more treats and put on more and more weight. Nick actually didn't mind it. In fact, it started to grow on him. His belly was exposed out of his uniform and he was looking close to a mini Clawhauser. He was starting to wonder if it was desk duty that made Clawhauser fat.

As Nick goes to the front desk, he sees a package for him. He looks at the box and sees Judy's name.

"Oh! A package from Judy! Wonder what she got me?" Nick asked himself.

Nick opened the package to find two whole blueberry pies. Nick was very happy.

"Blueberry pies! The little bunny knows me so well." Nick said happily.

Nick didn't waste time eating one of the pies. Not even eating it with a fork or knife. After eating the first pie, he licked the tin clean. It was clearly the best pie he has ever had. With one other pie leftover, Nick ate the other pie as well. Same way as before. As he finished up....
111111.title: Nick puts on more and more weight.

1111112.content:
The mule officer from before comes from the door. It looked like it was something urgent.

"WILDE! COME QUICK!" The mule shouted out. "You've got to come see this!"

"Hm?" Nick went before licking the blueberry filling off his face.

The officer then leads Nick to whatever was going down. A baked good truck had turned over a bunch of giant chocolate glazed doughnuts down on the ground. Each of them looking as big as Nick's head, if not bigger.

"Sweet cheese and crackers." Nick said stunned by the site.

"Yeah. A tire burst and dropped some of the cargo. Luckily, the driver is fine." The mule said as the grey wolf officer is filing a report of what happened with the bear driver. "It's gonna be a real pain to clean all of this up."

Nick looked at all the doughnuts and while he had two pies earlier, he was still hungry enough for more.

"Well.... I volunteer for clean-up duty." Nick said with a grin.

Nick went over and did one of the things cops did best, eat doughnuts. Eat giant doughnuts. Even if they were the kind meant for bigger mammals, Nick didn't mind. Only that they were so tasty. One was filling enough, but with Nick's growing appetite, one wasn't enough for him.

"Aaaaaaah. I love this job." Nick said happily as he patted his stomach and prepare for more.

Eating doughnut after doughnut and gaining a doughier belly from it. After a couple of minutes, cleanup was finally done and the fox was closer to a Mini-Clawhauser now. Nick was now twice the weight he was before he started feasting on the doughnuts.

"Great job, Wilde. You cleaned everything." The wolf officer said complementing Nick.

Nick responded with a burp. After cleaning up and finishing up, Nick went home and rubbed his belly. Nick wasn't the skinny fox he used to be. Yet, he didn't mind it.
1111112.title: An situation was going down.

choices: End the story here. (Like the comic)
Continue after Nick's eaten the whole cake.
11111122.content:
Like the last few day before, Nick was still on desk duty. With the newfound weight he had gained, he was becoming closer to Clawhauser. If not by weight and roundness, then by eating habits. On his desk was a big empty box of doughnuts and half an eaten pie.

Currently, Nick was on the phone with Judy talking to her about yesterday.

"They were as big as my head, Judy. It was awesome." Nick said describing the doughnuts.

"Wow. They sound pretty tasty." Judy said from the phone.

"Trust me, Carrots. They were." Nick said happily as he patted his exposed belly.

A loud shout then came from Bogo.

"WILDE! Is that a personal call?" The chief buffalo shouted out.

"Eep!" Nick shrieked. "Gotta go!" Nick then quickly hung up the phone and tried to regain his composure. "Of course not. That was Officer Hopps."

Bogo gave Nick a look, but was willing to take his word.

"As you know, the quarterly award is up." Bogo stated. "The votes are in..." Bogo then started smiling. ".... it would seem congratulations are in order. You done quite a good job, fox."

Other officers came and cheered for Nick.

"You turned out to be a real great cop." Bogo said looking proud of Nick.

Nick couldn't help but feel a bit emotional.

"I'm so.... I'm so honored, sir." Nick said a bit tearful.

Some of the officers then brought out a large 3-layer cake with white frosting and a #1 in the middle with blue icing. The cake was clearly for Nick and he already couldn't help but get a big slice. The cake was chocolate and pretty condensed. Nick's belly was expanding quite a bit from just a few bites. But Nick still found it tasty.

"This is soooooooo good. I better work even harder to win the annual award." Nick says as he eats more cake.
11111122.title: On the next day....

choices: He then gets a call from Judy.
He has the next day off.
It's his last day on desk duty.
111111222.content:
Not even needing help from the other officers, Nick completely devoured the 3 layer cake. Leaving nothing but a big plate of crumbs. After eating the cake, Nick was now most definitely fatter than Clawhauser by a decent margin. 3 times the size he was before he ate the cake. He needed help from some of the other officers to get back up.

"That cake was very delicious. Can't believe I ate the whole thing." Nick said as he proudly smacks his stomach a few times. "Sorry if you guys wanted a slice."

"It's fine. The cake was for you." A wolf officer said. "But I must say, you got a big appetite."

"More like a 'Wilde' appetite." Nick said making a pun. "Clear to say I have Clawhauser beat.... and I think I'm gonna add more to this."

Nick truly accepted his ever-growing weight. It also made it his work easier. But he did needed a bigger uniform since the buttons on his current one were close to popping. After work, Nick went home and quickly realized he needed more than just a new uniform to fit him. He had other clothes that weren't gonna fit him so well either. He had stretchy sweatpants and put that on, but no shirt.

As he laid the couch, that was closer to a chair for him now, he was wondering about how much bigger he could end up.
111111222.title: Continue after Nick's eaten the whole cake.

choices: He lays around and eats more food.
1111112222.content: What does Nick do on his day off?
1111112222.title: He has the next day off.

11111122221.content:
The very fat fox woke up and sat on his couch watching TV again. This was the first real day he had off in a while. At Nick sat looking at his massive belly that touched the ground even on the couch. His stomach was growling very loudly. A clear sign that Nick was hungry.

"No surprise after all I've eaten, this belly wants to cram more into it." Nick said as he patted his stomach. "What? A huge 3 layer cake wasn't enough for you?" Nick then took a lot of effort to get up. "Well let's fill you up."

Nick had an appetite wider than he was now. He could see wat he has in his kitchen or go out to eat. Maybe even go to a buffet.
11111122221.title: He lays around and eats more food.

choices: He was twice the weight of a elephant.
He was three times the weight of a elephant.
He cleared out the entire buffet and got REALLY fat.
111111222212.content:
A buffet sounded good. All the food you could eat at a fair price. Plus, knowing his fridge situation, Nick doubt he had enough to fill him up.

Nick puts on his usual shirt and pants, but a much bigger size, ones that fit him, and head to a buffet restaurant not too far from his apartment. A good thing too. Nick weren't as mobile as he used to be.

The breakfast buffet Nick went served mammals of any size hunger. Even as big as an hippo or elephant. Which was good cause Nick felt that he could out eat either. Nick looked at all the food the buffet had to offer. Pancakes, waffles, tofu eggs and vegan sausages to name a few items. Nick's belly growled wanting to have whatever the buffet had to offer.

"Time to show these mammals how much this fox can eat." Nick said with a sly grin.

Nick started with a large stack of elephant portion-sized blueberry pancakes. The stack was as tall as Judy was. After pouring a bunch of blueberry syrup and went to town on them. One was much for an average fox, but not for Nick.

The stack slowly disappeared and went right into Nick's stomach as it expands more. Once those were gone, Nick went for the vegan sausage links and slurp them like spaghetti. Then went for the waffles bigger than his head. The more he ate, the wider he was getting and his pace wasn't slowing down even a bit.

All the others mammals were stunned and amazed that the fox could eat so much as he was starting to rival the weight of a full grown elephant.

After Nick was done....
111111222212.title: Nick goes to a buffet.

1111112223.content:
Once again, Nick sat at the front desk of the ZPD. Nick had to get a bigger chair due to being close to Clawhauser's size now. This would most likely be Nick's last day on desk duty. Clawhauser's vacation is almost over, so you would most likely go back to the best. Judy's also supposed to come back soon. While Nick didn't say it, he missed Judy this past couple of days.

Currently, with his growing appetite, Nick consumed box after box of doughnuts. There wasn't much going on today. Nick finished his fifth dozen box of giant doughnuts. He licks the frosting of his fingers.

"Mmm. I see why Ben loves these so much." Nick said to himself.

Nick's belly has been growing more and more from the eating. Especially it came to pastries. Another few pies from Judy, a couple more doughnut boxes, tarts, and other treats. Nick's weight was now matching the weight of a hippo. Bigger gut, a thicker butt, puffy cheeks the size of basketballs, and arms thicker than branches.

"Man, I wonder how Carrots is going to react to me like this?" Nick thought as he lifted up his stomach.

After the day, Nick went home to relax. He had the day off tomorrow morning. So it was a good time to chill. As he changed his clothes, even if they barely fit him, something got his attention.
1111112223.title: It's his last day on desk duty.

11111122232.content:
Nick hears a knock on his door.

"Who is it?" Nick shouted out to whoever's knocking.
"Nick? Nick? It's me." The voice was Judy's voice.
"Ca.... Carrots?" Nick said a bit surprised.

It was Judy at the door. Nick was caught a bit off guard. Judy wasn't supposed to be home until tomorrow. She's back a whole day early.

"Yeah. It's me, Nick. Can you open up? I want to see you." Judy said.

Nick looked a bit worried. He never told Judy about the weight he gained. He didn't know how Judy would react to him being several times the fox he is. Would she be disgusted by him?

"Nick?" Judy said waiting for a response.
"Coming! Just.... give me a minute." Nick replied.

Nick couldn't stall. He had to open the door for Judy. As he waddled to the door, his paw shook a bit before opening it. When he did Judy....
11111122232.title: Judy returns earlier than expected.

choices: "You are in need of big diet, fatso."
111111222321.content:
Judy's eyes went wide seeing the hefty bulk of Nick.
"Uhmmmm... hi Carrots." Nick offered a meek hello to stunned bunny.
"Ni-Nick? Wha- what happened to you?" Judy asks reaching her tiny hand to touch mighty dome of Nick's belly, sinking into it.
"Weell I learned the hard way that filling Clawhauser's spot means quite... uhm upgrade in size." Nick tried his best to explain why he was fatter than cheetah.
Judy was silent her hand pressing Nick's fat and her eyes wandered over his well fed figure.
"Everything alright Carrots?" Nick asked being a bit worried that what Judy thinks of him.

Judy breaks her silence. "I should have expected you putting on some weight when I heard all the calls where you told what you've been eating but I did not expected this size, I mean your chest is bigger than mine." Judy remarks reaching up to poke Nick's moob a bit making Nick to fluster a bit.

"I need to hit a diet now do I?" Nick hang his head low smothering his double chin but Judy looked up to Nick.

"Actually Nick."
111111222321.title: A stunned thin bunny

111111222322.content:
Nick was a bit stunned with what he saw. Beyond stunned, actually. Judy, the once slim and tiny bunny, wasn't really that anymore. She was fat too. In fact, she was close to showing the same obesity as Nick.

Her belly was exposed and partially touching the ground. Her cheeks showed extra puffiness like it was holding two tennis balls. The only thing bigger than her gut was her bunny rump. It was almost as wide as Nick's gut.

Nick wasn't the only one stunned. Judy was just as stunned to see Nick in his new wider frame. The two froze as they looked at each other.

"Judy...." Nick said still stunned.
"Nick...." Judy said still stunned.
"Wow.... um.... you look...." Nick said.
"And you look...." Judy said.
".... well-fed." Nick and Judy said looking at the other's guts.
"Can I come in?" Judy asked Nick.
"Can you? That bunny butt of yours may not get pass the door." Nick said.

Trying not to feel insulted, Judy still wanted to come in. However.... Nick was joking about getting pass the door. Judy's big rump couldn't get pass the door. She was now wedged in between the doorway.

"See? Same thing happened to me with this gut of mine." Nick stated to the stuck bunny.
"Just help me out!" Judy said getting mad.

Nick insisted to help Judy and grabbed both her arms to tugged. After three pulls, Nick got Judy out, but put a bit too much power in that last pull. It caused Judy to trip and fall on Nick. It was a good thing that Nick's belly was like a big cushion. His belly smooshed together with Judy's. Both Nick and Judy were red-faced.

"S.... sorry!" Judy said flustered.
"N.... no! It was my fault." Nick said as flustered as Judy.

Judy and Nick then got up the best way they could. After that, Nick and Judy looked at each other. Still surprised by the weight they both put on.

"So.... uhh.... what happen to you?" Judy asked.
"Apparently, taking Clawhauser's job also meant having his weight." Nick said lifting up his massive go and dropping it to watch it bounce. "This is the result of doughnuts, truffles, tarts, pies, a 3 layer cake, and more doughnuts. What about you?"
"I'm the product of Gideon Grey's baking." Judy stated as she patted her stomach. "Carrot cupcakes, carrot-ginger pie, carrot cake, and carrot doughnuts. A little here...." Judy then patted the side of her butt. ".... and a LOT here."
"So we both went a little overboard." Nick said.
"A little is an understatement." Judy said as she places her paws on Nick's blobby belly. "Looks like you packed a lot into this gut."
"Looks like you packed a lot into that butt." Nick said with a smirk as he looks at Judy's backside.
"Don't remind me." Judy said not looking too happy. "I was tempted to stay at Bunnyburrow because of it."

This information stunned Nick.

"You were?" Nick asked.
"Look at me, Nick. How can I be a part of the ZPD looking like this?" Judy asked.
"Have you seen me and Ben?" Nick asked. "Even with the extra baggage, I can handle the weight."
"There was.... also something else." Judy said. "Gideon.... he had feelings for me."
"Oh...." Nick said with widen eyes.
"He.... even wanted me to stay." Judy admitted. "But, while I was thankful for the treats, and told him.... there was someone else. He seemed down but totally understood."
"Feelings for someone else? Anyone I should know?" Nick asked with a grin.
"He's smart, cunning, a bit of a joker, but he's also really sweet." Judy said with a smile.
"Oh. Sounds like he's a real catch." Nick said smiling slyly.
"You know it's you, right?" Judy asked with a smirk.
"The moment you started talking." Nick said.

Nick then held Judy's paws.

"Whether thin or pudgy, you and me are meant to be." Nick said with a smile.
"Are you gonna kiss me now or what?" Judy asked with a sly smile.
"I intend to, my not-so-little bunny." Nick said with a grin.

Nick and Judy then kissed. Even with their newfound weight, they seem to care about each other. No matter what.
111111222322.title: Was pretty fat too.

1111112223221.content:
The days went by as they usually would. Nick and Judy were still doing their police work. Just with an extra couple hundreds of pounds. The other members of the ZPD didn't seem to mind the extra weight they both put on. If anything, it seem to make them more capable.

Nick and Judy are also currently dating. Both of them were fine with the weight, but were conflicted between losing the weight or adding more to it. Either way, they were find as long had each other.

While in the break room, Nick had spotted a big box of doughnuts. Opening them up, he was already licking his chops.

"I suppose I could have just one." Nick thought with a smirk.

It wasn't going to be just one.
1111112223221.title: Epilogue.

choices: "Well sure thing, I haven't noticed your into bellybuttons"
"Maybe later. But for now, do you know a gym that I can work out in?"
11112.content:
As Nick save the rest for later, he heard a door bell ring. So he decided to answer the door and who was at the door was non other then his best friend Fox Prince.

"Fox Prince, fancy seeing you here." Nick said as he sucks in his stomach to prevent him from noticing his pudgy belly.

"Yes it is" Fox Prince replied as he noticed that he was talking funny while holding his breath. "Uh Nick, why are you holing your breath like that?"

Nick figured that Fox Prince might noticed something going on with him. But she couldn't hold his breath for that long, he gasped to get some air and his belly was all out in front of Fox Prince.

"Nick, what happened to you? You look like your pregnant" said Fox Prince as she was surprised by Nick's belly being a bit exposed.

"Oh it's just that I ate the whole box of doughnuts, almost like how Clawhauser would do." said Nick as he lifted his shirt up to show Fox Prince his pudgy belly that he put on. "Then an elephant offered me a bag full of blueberry tarts as well"

Fox Prince wasn't mad at Nick for having a pudgy belly, cause his bellybutton that he has caught Fox Prince's interest since he really likes those anyway.

"Aren't you upset with me for putting on weight?" asked Nick as ne noticed that Fox Prince was still staring at his belly.

"I believe you've got a nice bellybutton" said Fox Prince as he still stares at his bellybutton.

"Gee why thank you" said Nick as he smiles a bit.

"Uh you wouldn't mind if I kissed your bellybutton, would you?" asked Fox Prince as he wanted to give Nick's bellybutton a kiss.

Nick thought about it for a bit and his answer was...
11112.title: Save some for later.

115.content:
Story 5: Nick's already fat and is adding more to it and becoming more Wide than Wilde.

Story 6: Nick spends time with Clawhauser and starts picking up his eating habits.
115.title: More choices

11513.content: Let's go bigger for the fox.
11513.title: Bigger Choices.

115133.content: Time for the massive sizes.
115133.title: Even bigger.

1151333.content: Shall the fox be big enough to cover up Zootopia or even further?
1151333.title: Even bigger than that.

11513333.content: At this point, Nick’s getting too big to still be able to fit onto the planet!
11513333.title: Bigger Still.

115133333.content: Is Nick the size of the solar system?
115133333.title: Bigger Still.

1152.content:
Sometime after solving the Nighthowler case with his rabbit friend Judy Hopps, Nick Wilde has just graduated from the Zootopia Police Academy as the city’s first fox police officer who is then assigned to become Judy’s partner.

However, their partnership lasted short.

One week after their first case since the Nighthowler conspiracy, Nick and Judy were tracking down a ship smuggling illegal fur-rugs off the Polar Straits in the Tundratown District. Nick was too busy taunting Judy with her carrot recorder, she forced herself out of the driver's seat only for Nick to use his foot and push Judy’s head to the wheel which then honked, and all of a sudden the workers on the dock quickly skedaddled. A car pursuit was then followed.


While trying to catch up on one of the smuggling vehicles, Judy became so infuriated at Nick for blowing their cover. When crossing an intersection between Tundratown and Sahara Square, all of a sudden, a fast car comes rushing in and plummets the driver’s section of the squad car into hitting a light post. Nick luckily survived, but poor Judy was all banged up. He wanted to make sure if she was okay but then called for an ambulance, which arrived shortly thereafter.

~~~

Back at ZPD, Chief Bogo was not happy at the fact that Nick’s point of view was something that Bogo wasn’t buying into.

“Chief, what I did was a very silly and stupid mistake. I didn’t mean for Officer Hopps to be wound up like this,” said Nick.

“Yet your insubordinate actions have caused your partner to be lying in a hospital bed at the moment!” Bogo yelled in reply.

“Sir, I…”

“Is this playtime for you, Wilde?” Bogo continued while standing up, “Your days of being a kid are no more! You need to act up and prove to me that you’re a true officer of the law! If not, you’ll be let go and into the unknown, but until then, I’m suspending you from fieldwork until further notice.”

Bogo sat back down in his office chair, while Nick wasn’t excited to hear this news.

“Oh c’mon, Chief. One week out and I’m temporarily grounded? I mean what can I do in the meantime.”

“You’ll be reassigned to work at your desk with some paperwork every day for the time being.”

Nick facepalmed himself, “Ugh, great. I’m gonna be stuck doing the most boring job in all the precinct.”

“I’m sorry Wilde, but when stuff like this happens, and you’re responsible, you’ll have to get used to reassignments every now and then. And I know you’re still relatively new to this, but if you have any problems in general you can always come up to me.”

“Thank you, Chief. But where exactly is my desk again?”

“Next to Clawhauser’s.”

“Oh no, that big guy who’s into Gazelle all the way down in the lobby?”

“Oh no, he was reassigned back to regular desk duty just a few hours ago. The big guy slipped and fell on some wet floor next to one of my best men, next thing he knew is he broke that man’s leg. Someone will take over for him upfront at the reception desk. In fact, I reassigned him just before you put dear Hopps to beddy-bye. Alright, now go to your desk and start working”

“Yes, sir.” said Nick, but then he thought “Uh, where’s…”

“Northwest from where you are. Same floor. All the cubicles look like S’s. Not that hard to find”

“Thank you.”

~~~

Nick’s new job at the ZPD was boring. He was stuck at his desk filing some important documents. But sitting across from Benjamin Clawhauser, a morbidly obese cheetah, was an entirely different feeling. He just picked up three boxes of a dozen donuts, as well as a six-pack of bottled Sunflower Soda.

“Hey, Officer Wilde. It’s nice to finally meet you” said Clawhauser in excitement. He let go of the six-pack in order to greet Nick’s hand, “Judy has told me a lot about you. I can’t believe you’re my new partner.”

Clawhauser’s bubbly and lighthearted personality at least gave Nick a little ray of sunshine from that dark cloud that’s been hurtling around his head for the past few hours. Surprised by the way Clawhauser looks, he may have already felt like they became quick buddies.

“Uh, yeah. You can call me Nick. Apparently Bogo reassigned me to be with you for the time being.” To which Nick replied.

“Well, I can’t wait to start off this new friendship with you Nick.” He sits down with the donuts in place. “Now, I know what you’re probably gonna ask me why I’m this fat, but it’s okay. I’ve had people calling me that over the years, but I’ve embraced it. I’m happy with my body and who I am in general. I love being this big. I don’t care if you complain at all.”

“Well, that’s not gonna be me. I’ve had friends growing up who were big as well, and I know how they feel when they’re being called on.” How long have you been working at the ZPD?”

“Almost 10 years.” Clawhauser was already down a couple of donuts while answering the question. “I was on active duty for my first three but then my partner, Jonny Colfax, hit his head on a cement wall while playing a little basketball.”

“Oooh, sorry to hear that.”

“Oh, he’s fine, his head’s made of stone, but I don’t wanna get into too much detail.” Clawhauser continues to devour his first box of donuts. Nick on the other hand was surprised at how much he could eat.

“But ever since then up until, just now I guess, you were working in the lobby?”

“For the most part.” As Clawhauser just finished his first dozen.He then grabbed a bottle of Sunflower Soda to help wash down the donuts in his mouth.

Clawhauser then continued, “Sorry. Where are my manners? Do you want one? I heard from Judy that you love blueberries. There must be a few in there. I thought it would be nice to give you a little something sweet for a pretty salty day you’ve been having” He hands Nick a new box of donuts to which he’s tempted in.
1152.title: A Big Reassignment

choices: I'd love to grab a bite with you.
I'd got other plans, but thanks for asking.
11521.content:
“Sure. Why not,” replied Nick.

He grabs and takes a bite of that blueberry donut and his taste buds felt like a sugary rush in his mouth that he hasn’t felt in a long time. That delightful feeling of forgotten euphoria.

He immediately polishes off that first donut, then ate a second and third. By the time he ate halfway through the fourth, he knew his stomach capacity was starting to hit a wall, and when he finished it he knew he was done with food that afternoon.

Evening came, the day shift came to an end. Nick and Clawhauser we’re walking out the building. After their initial bondage as newly made friends, they’ve been conversing about their own lives, personal stories, favorite hobbies, etc.

“Hey, are you hungry? Do you wanna grab a bite?” asked Clawhauser.

Nick was still feeling a little full from those donuts and his shirt started to feel a little tight. But he feels like he doesn’t want to let his new big buddy down.
11521.title: That Donut Feeling

115211.content:
“I’d love to grab a bite with you,” said Nick, even though he was a little worried that he might feel sick later.

“Awesome.” Clawhauser grins with delight. “What are you in the mood for?”

“Um…” Nick was thinking that he wanted food that’s…
115211.title: I'd love to grab a bite with you.

choices: I'm more of a pizza guy.
1152111.content:
“Let’s go for a quick bite,” said Nick as they were still walking outside of the ZPD with the sun going down.

“Alright. I know a good joint,” said Clawhauser still feeling wonderful. He then asks Nick, “Do you wanna go for a burrito?”
1152111.title: Cheap & quick.

11521111.content:
“If you’re down, I’m down. I’m fine with whatever.” Nick replied.

They keep walking down a few blocks until they reach a Mexican food truck called Locos con Todos. It is run by Julio, a jaguar who’s about half the size of Clawhauser. He started his business just a few years ago after surprising his friends with his home cooking at a Cinco de Mayo celebration. Julio was sporting a long blue-collar shirt with his sleeves rolled up with an apron covering it up and a red baseball cap flipped backwards. His truck’s usually parked close to the shopping district, but it wasn’t too busy, despite being dinner time. When he saw Clawhauser coming up to his truck, he immediately knew his favorite customer was gonna bring a chunk of change to his business.

“Hola, Benny,” said Julio, “How’s my favorite officer these days?”

“Muy Bueno, Julio” Benny responded back with compassion, “As a matter of fact, I heard Gazelle’s extending her residency at the Zootopian bowl till the end of next year.”

“Haha, I figured. You won’t find a singer more excelente than her. My little niña can not stop listening to her music.” Julio didn’t realize that Nick was there as well. “Hey, Benny, is he your new amigo?” he said, pointing at Nick looking happy yet a little confused.

“Why yes, it is. Introduce yourself.”

“Hi, I’m Officer Wilde. I was just assigned to be Benny’s new partner for the time being.” To which Nick responded.

“Well any amigo of Benny, is an amigo of mine.” shouted Julio, “As a matter of fact, you two should order a lot,” looking back at Benny demandingly, “Your friend right here is all skin and bones. He needs to get grande!”

“Uh, I don’t know if that’s necessary at all. I’m-” Nick said, as he was trying to convince Julio he doesn’t need the extra weight.

“Officers like you and Benny need to be well-fed every day. No officer needs to starve!”

“Well, thanks, but-”

“It’s not a simple si or no question. It’s an order.”

Benny tries to calm Nick down, “Don’t worry about that, he just likes seeing people with a little more pudge around them. You’re not gonna feel terrible about it. In fact, I won’t mind seeing you a bit on the wide side, Officer WILDE.”

Benny was poking at Nick’s shirt which was tight, but his stomach felt a little pudge. Now he felt completely guilty for trying to force himself out of it, and yet Clawhauser’s silly move made him even feel more sympathetic.

“Okay, fine. I’ll do it.” said Nick, “But for one thing. As soon as Judy and I are back as partners, I’m gonna plead Chief Bogo to offer you back your front desk position. From there, we can still see each other on a regular basis. I mean, I like you a lot, Benny, don’t get me wrong. But promise me, no matter how big I get, I'm gonna start losing it afterward.”

“You don’t really have to do it,” Benny replied. “It’s more like Julio’s order in general.”

“I don’t care if it’s his or your order, I’m gonna do it no matter what. I’ll eat whatever you want, whenever you want, wherever you want. I’ll eat however many you get. Okay, so whaddya say?”

Benny’s eyes widened when he heard that spiel, “Ohhhhhhhhhhhh, it looks like Wilde’s gonna get wide now.”

“Haha, fantastico,” said Julio, “So what’ll it be?”

“Well, how many burritos are you getting Benny?” said Nick while raising his arm midway through his torso.

“Oh, did I mention these burritos here are huge?” said Benny. “Let's get...”
11521111.title: Yeah, sure.

115211112.content:
“All of them with your usual fill-ins?” said Julio.

“Si, por favor,” said Clawhauser.

“Excelente! We’ll have that right out for you soon.” He then looks towards his chefs and yells “Seis Verdes!” That’s ‘Six Greens’ in Spanish. The burrito has an Asian-based ingredient known as wheat gluten but is typically called “Seitan”, it mostly acts as a meat substitute where it has a chicken taste to it. They cook it with diced green chilies and caramelized onions in a sweet and savory sauce, plus a mix of Colby jack and pepper jack cheese, plus big heaping portions of cilantro-lime rice, black beans, french fries, guacamole, and sour cream.

Looking through the window of the food truck, Nick was seeing how making that BIG of a burrito was somewhat oddly satisfying and making him hungrier. He then was thinking in his head, "These things are MASSIVE! You can't eat all 3 of these, you'll only eat about half of one. YOU NEED TO STOP THIS, NICK! YOU'RE CRAZY!", He should've thought twice about saying he would eat as much as Clawhauser, each one was about the size of his own foxy head.

It took about 30 seconds to assemble each one, and there were two of Julio’s co-workers working on it. Within two minutes, Nick and Clawhauser’s food was ready.

"Order up" shouted Julio as he rang a bell while carrying two big brown paper sacks on his other arm. Clawhauser grabbed the sacks from him that are filled with burrito goodness.

“Muchas gracias, Julio. You and your hombres are lifesavers,” said Benny as he and Nick were about to leave.

“Don’t mention it,” Julio replied, “I hope your new friend will enjoy the pleasures of being big.”

"Oh, I hope for it. As long as the ZPD still pays," said Nick who still isn’t happy about the plan he made with Clawhauser.

“Anyway Nick, where do you wanna eat these at?,” said Clawhauser, “I was thinking either at my place or your place”

Nick didn't mention to Clawhauser that he was living in Judy's cramped apartment at the time. But now, thinking about what his new friend's place would be like, he could like it. But then again, he thought it through and decided.
115211112.title: These are BIG Burritos!

choices: "How do I even become a perfect father if I am getting this chubby?"
"Careful Wilde, who ever this criminal is always leaves his victims inflated"
1153.content:
Story 1. Nick Wilde and Judy Hopps were on watch in their police car from patrol, Nick Wilde decided to stop at a doughnut shop to get himself a treat while Judy waited for him since she didn't want to eat dounts as she's on a diet but Nick has no idea that there's a criminal who specializes in adding a potion to a sweet food that makes anyone fat from just eating it.

Story 2. It has been five years after Nick and Judy's wedding and Judy has announced that she's pregnant, this stresses Nick very much as he's about to become a father which results in him gaining weight as he gets a dad body.

Story 3. Nick Wilde is on a case of finding a mysterious suspect that's been known to inflate mammals in Zootopia, will he be careful to not get caught up in this scheme?
1153.title: Other choices.

choices: The world's strongest and fattest animal.
11533.content:
In light of a previous interactive chapter that blocked any and all interactive story paths, I am going to open up an alternate route for Writing.Com's authors.

Now then here are two never before seen stories starring Mr Nicholas Wilde himself.

Never before seen story #1 The world's strongest and fattest animal: One day Mr Wilde finds a flyer for a worldwide contest known as The world's strongest and fattest animal as he decides to enter this competition and train himself in order to win the title of the world's strongest and fattest animal.

Never before seen story #2 The sumo wrestling adventure: One day our hero decides to take up the sport of sumo wrestling as he's about to fulfill his dream of not only becoming a sumo wrestler but he's also about to fulfill his dream of becoming a sumo wrestling champion.
11533.title: "Careful Wilde, who ever this criminal is a...

12.content:
The bunny from the country that moves to the big city. Just pick a section and start a story.


Story 1: Being from the country, Judy actually has a bigger appetite than one would think. After being in Zootopia for over a year, she finally gets a good taste of the food the city has to offer.

Story 2: Judy goes to Bunnyburrow for a festival with Nick. The festival is loaded with so many treats to try. One more fattening than the next.

Story 3: After being stuck with Clawhauser's desk duty, Judy is starting to fit into the role.... in more ways than one.

Story 4: Nick treats Judy to dinner at some of the best places in the city. With so many restaurants, it's no real surprise that it could affect someone's waistline.

Story 5: Free Choice
12.title: Judy Hopps

choices: Clawhauser starts sharing his doughnuts with her.
She finds a new all-you-can-eat buffet.
121.content:
Growing up on a farm imparts certain characteristic on a person. Diligence, a respect for manual labour and a healthy appetite. The last was something that Judy Hopps had in abundance. She often surprised her coworkers with the amount of food she put away at lunch matching the bigger animals on the force bite for bite.
Ever since she came to Zootopia however she had gotten a strong taste for all the great food the diverse city had to offer. From upscale restaurants to fast food chains Judy really wanted to try everything when it came to the city's cuisine and it was starting to show on her waistline. The rabbit already had a noticeable pudge around her midsection and some extra padding on her hips, rear and thighs and she was only going to get bigger especially when...
121.title: Story 1

14.content:
Story 1: Ben is trying to diet in order to do better as a police office, but is having withdraws from his love of donuts...

Story 2: Ben is continuously made fun of for his chubby form, which causes him to stress eat

Story 3: Ben ends up in a relationship with a girl (animal of choice) who doesn't mind if he gains a couple (hundered) more pounds
14.title: Benjamin Clawhauser

15.content:
The movie does have other characters too, ya know?

Chief Bogo: Buffalo Chief of the ZPD and very firm boss to Nick and Judy.

Gazelle: #1 Pop singer of Zootopia that everyone loves.

Leodore Lionheart: Lion mayor of Zootopia.... before screwing up.

Dawn Bellwether: Sheep Assistant Mayor of Zootopia.... who was evil and tried to ruin things in the city.
15.title: Others

155.content: How about Nick and Judy at the same time?
155.title: Others

1551.content:
Pick a story for the fox and bunny duo.

Story 1: Nick and Judy have been eating out with Clawhauser and it's starting to show.

Story 2: Nick and Judy, being the smallest mammals in the ZPD, decide to 'bulk' up. But not the 'muscle' way.
1551.title: Fox and Bunny Gaining? Yeah!

15511.content: Do Nick and Judy start off skinny or are they already fat?
15511.title: Story 1

choices: The Fox and Rabbit are fairly chubby.
Two are quite fat weighing more than the average fox and bunny.
155112.content: How fat are they fox and rabbit duo?
155112.title: Already fat.

info.brief_description: Certain characters from Zootopia put on a  bit or a lot of weight.
info.description:
The characters from the Disney movie, Zootopia, are gaining a few pounds. Whether it's the sly fox, the dumb bunny, or someone else, the choice is yours.

The rules:
-Keep it clean on a PG level.
-Main character has to be the gainer. Others can gain too, but the main gainer is the main focus.
-No limit to the weight gain. They can go from chubby to the size of Zootopia and beyond.
-No gore

That's pretty much it. Have at it.
